dct_title_s: Palo Alto Santa Clara Co. Cal
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Feet".
Compass rose indicates north toward upper left of sheet.
Shows streets and bulidings, some labeled according to individual rooms.
Includes key, which explains color coding for different construction materials, e.g., red for brick and blue for stone.
"Population 1000. No steam & no hand engines. No. independent hose carts. Water facilities see note. Prevailing winds N.W."
dct_publisher_sm: Sanborn - Perris Map Co., Limited, 117 & 119 Broadway
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
